nodes.name: ML
nodes.content: How can transiently unquantified attributes be evaluated efficiently by computational models? Given successful examples of achieving structural similarity between convolutional neural networks and human visual cortex, owing benefit to the labeling scheme and the modeling strategy, how can it be applied to other data?

nodes.name: social structure
nodes.content: What is the trade-off between a highly efficient social structure and that which yields maximum happiness to it's components, given that evolution of out society will eventually reach a point where this may be relevant. (not a good question IMO, but I'll keep it for reference.)

nodes.name: collective goals
nodes.content: How are balances achieved between groups with different common initial goals? What are the dynamics between the groups? What about individuals inside the groups?

nodes.name: illumination
nodes.content: What is the best way to illuminate a given space? I usually find my room not lighted to my desire, too bright some where and too dim some other places. What parameters would need to be taken into considerations?

nodes.name: interfacing
nodes.content: What control utilizes the maximum potential of humans? Keyboards and trackpads are fairly young, wearable tech haven't been fully explored and realized. What is the next step?

nodes.name: interfacing
nodes.content: What criteria are there for controlling schemes for different tasks, given that a computer uses as little as a cursor and a keyboard (touch screen isn't much different)?

nodes.name: optimization
nodes.content: What is the best way to slice up a melon? Some people slice big chunks of skin, wasting the meat, but saves effort of cuttings, where as some others slice as close to the curve. Can the trade off be quantified and let similar problems be solved once and for all.

nodes.name: optimization
nodes.content: A good way to cut cakes (with concerns of left overs) is to extract parallel pieces from the middle, and combine the remaining pieces from the two sides, so surface area of the inside of the cake exposed for oxidation is minimized. How can this be applied to other fields?

nodes.name: improvement
nodes.content: I often combine tooth brush, tooth paste, dental floss, tooth picks, mouth wash and gums for dental hygiene, since they excel at different realms, but is there a better way to do so?

nodes.name: adapting
nodes.content: What happens exactly to insects population that live by certain climate? How did they adapt, and how can this be used to create adaptive response systems?

nodes.name: reshape
nodes.content: Glass and metal can be molded into different shapes. What if glass or metal structures (tables) can reshape themselves?

nodes.name: reshape
nodes.content: Can 3D printing be used to reshape items rather than simply print with filments or powders of material?

nodes.name: measure of change
nodes.content: Random processes can create significant changes, where as seemingly big deals may die down unexpectedly. Can one measure and predict the range of influence an incident has on the space-time?

nodes.name: solitude
nodes.content: A lot of people have had problems isolating sensory input. What would be a good implementation to enjoy solitude?

nodes.name: Visualization of sound
nodes.content: I've always wanted to have the world look differently when I listen to certain pieces of music. What would be a good implementation for such an AR, while not imparing safety?

nodes.name: Recipe
nodes.content: I tend to cook something well the first time I try it, then not so good the following few trys when I try to vary the techques. What if there's a way to control the quality while experimenting? An Machine learning, or optimization process?

nodes.name: Classification
nodes.content: My topics here is getting more than a single type and name and set apart. Maybe I'll need some more flexable labeling machanism?

nodes.name: Recording
nodes.content: What's a convenient way to record the important bits of daily life, without it being too much of a burden?

nodes.name: experience->ground truth
nodes.content: By extracting attributes with text retrieval and unsupervised learning, then supervised training with quantitative performance evaluation as ground truth.

nodes.name: aperture lamp
nodes.content: A single light source with multiple apertures and lenses, supported by a long, controllable, and flexible extension arm.

nodes.name: flock lamp
nodes.content: A flexible light source composed with a massive matrix of tiny individual light sources (micro led) that can be tuned individually, yet manageable by group behaviors. The source will adapt to the required environment with manual preference tuning and sensors.

nodes.name: Amazon Echo
nodes.content: Amazon released a new generation of Echo with half the price, causing a huge amount of complaining on the product's page. It may be interesting to look at the correlation between development and sales of an product and it's early stage marketing.

nodes.name: A little rock
nodes.content: I kicked a piece of rock on the road while walking. It should've been the smallest incident in one's life, but at the time I started to think about the butterfly effect, how the displacement of a piece of rock may change things. Then I decided that by reinforcing myself on the subject of this incident, I'm effectively make a tiny ripple into a big tide in my life. Then again, when one day I forget about it, it may as well be just another mundane thought.

nodes.name: Wine glass shapes
nodes.content: There are researches on how the shapes of wine glasses affect the evaporation of ethanol and hence, the taste of wine.

nodes.name: mosquitos
nodes.content: Insects such as mosquitos prevail during the hot weather yet go away during the cold weather.

nodes.name: Recording
nodes.content: When I went to a stadium for a big event, the carnivore like environment was all stimulating. For the first time in my life I wanted to record everyhing. There are also various services which helps to take photos for people without them putting too much effort it.
